shorts.title: Holiday spirit thrives at Feliz Navidad Pop-up Bar
shorts.title_distilled: Holiday spirit thrives at Feliz Navidad Pop-up Bar.
shorts.description: DICKSON CITY, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — There's still some time to get into the holiday spirit in Lackawanna County. Burrito Loco in Dickson City has been serving up more than just authentic Mexican dishes, and Sunday is the final day for their Feliz Navidad Pop-up Bar. This year's theme was The Grinch, featuring cocktails, meals, [...]

shorts.title: Lackawanna County issues Code Blue though New Year's Eve
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County issues Code Blue though New Year's Eve.
shorts.description: LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — A Code Blue has been issued for the next few days in response to upcoming cold winter weather. The Code Blue will be in effect 8:00 p.m. Monday night through 7:00 a.m. Tuesday morning, and 8:00 p.m. Tuesday night through 7:00 a.m. Wednesday morning. St. Anthony's Haven, Weston Field House, and [...]
